I would like to take to this moment to tell you how beautiful your smile is and the way you flip your hair in the morning, that is the most amazing feeling in the world. Good morning, darling. Wishing you a great day ahead.
Every morning when I wake up next to you, I feel a sense of security and belongingness with you. I keep holding your hand and kissing it gently just for the self-comfort that I get being with you.

Mornings are always better because I have you by my side and it feels like the best feeling in the world. I could feel the warmth of your love and how embrace everything about us. Love you, God morning darling!
Every day I wake up I thank God for giving me such a lovable and caring wife, I feel like a blessing that I get to share my life with you, thank you, wife! Here’s a good morning kiss coming your way!
Good morning, my sweetheart. Wishing you a wonderful day filled with joy, and happiness. Stay fresh!
Your beautiful smile is a gift, opening for me every morning. Every smile of yours makes my whole day. Good morning, my dear!
Good morning, my love. I hope your day would be as wonderful as you are. You are the most beautiful person I have ever met!
To my beautiful wife, have I ever confessed it to you that you look so pretty in the morning, I wish to keep staring at you the whole day. Good morning, my dear wife!
Good morning to my sweetest wife, waking up next to you is a blessing!
It's always a good morning to see your face first thing in the morning!
I love your morning smell, it's so fresh. Good morning love!
Seeing you in the morning brings a sense of security, good morning wife!
Have a blissful morning wife, I hope to spend my entire life with you!
Let's spend every day like, have a good morning love!
Good morning to my forever person, may you always succeed!
Have a very production wife, hope you have a good morning!
Let's never fight and sleep because I love you very much. Good morning!
Good morning to the most beautiful person I know, love you wife!
Everytime I wake up beside you, it feels like a blessing. Good morning to my heart!
The best part is to wake up next to you and that reminds me how lucky I am to have you. Good morning sweetheart!
It feels magical to wake up next to you and it reminds me that we are bonded forever, good morning wife!

The best decision of my life was marrying you, and now I can enjoy every sunrise with a mug of coffee holding your hands. The best morning anyone could ever ask for! Good morning, my beautiful wife. I love you so much.
I hope my day becomes as beautiful and productive as my beautiful wife is. My morning becomes way amazing when I see you. Thank you for your forever support and care. Good morning, my love.
When I wake up, my first thought is you for the rest of the day. Just thinking about you makes me happy. I love you so much, my dear. Good morning. Have a nice day!

Waking up and watching you sleep, your hand lies under your cheek, a perfect morning for me! You are the reason behind my happiness. Wishing you a good morning with loads of hugs and kisses. May you have a productive day!

Many people dream about being in heaven. But I must be the only man in the whole world to wake up to heaven – the sight of a face as beautiful as yours. I woke up thinking about how lucky I am to have such a beautiful, capable, intelligent woman as my wife and just had to tell you. Good morning!

Another morning to start with my queen. Only you motivate me to wake me up in the morning. No matter how my day is, your smile can make everything easy and fun. Isn’t it magical how you are in my thoughts from dusk till dawn? Good morning, my love.
You brighten my mornings with a grin and a cup of coffee, so I never feel bored. You and I are the only ones who matter, and nothing else can stand in the way of our happiness together. Good morning!

When you love someone, you may appreciate their qualities even when they don’t recognize them. Knowing that you’re calmly sleeping beside me fills me with enormous satisfaction. I’ll be here for you and love your flaws for good. A very good morning!

Hello, the world’s most stunning lady. You reign supreme in my affections, and I can’t see my world without you. You are why my heart continues to beat; every time it does, I think of you. Good morning my love!
I am the luckiest to wake up next to you. Good morning, my wife. Have a lovely day!
Waking up next to you and kissing you softly is the best part of my morning. Good morning, dear.
Every morning turns out to be a beautiful one after seeing your smiling face. Good morning, my love.
I love you so much sweetheart, I just don’t know where to start. Maybe because my love for you is like the sunrise, every day it is a new prize. Good morning.
You are the first thing I crave after waking up from my bed. Good morning, my dear wife.
I don’t know how long we will be together because that is not important. What I do know and what really matters, is that we will never be apart. Good morning.
To my sweet lover, wishing you a good morning. Your presence in my life has bloomed many special moments of cherishing together with you and I would want that forever to continue.
That morning, when I wake up and saw your face, is always awesome. You make my day so special. Good morning my sweet wife worthwhile. Good Morning to the most precious gem of my life.
Like the rain, it all pours down to our feet, Like the sun, it all shines out above the underneath. With your love and mine, I am ready to survive all the test of time.

When you receive a text message from me in the morning, I’m not just saying good morning but saying that I’m honored to have someone as special as you in my life. I bless the day our path crossed, I wish you all the good things of life today and always, and may all your dreams come true for you, my baby. Good morning my sunshine.

You are my wife, friend and the closest companion in the world built of love, you are my light when there is darkness, my joy in times of sadness and my energy in times of weakness. I so much cherish you and that’s just the truth, my sweet love!

Our love is beyond all description. The universe in all of its glory isn’t enough to allow for a true comparison. Eternity isn’t long enough for us to spend together. All of the diamonds in the universe wouldn’t sparkle with the light I see in your eyes. All the stars in existence don’t burn with the heat of our romance. I could say I’d run to the edge of the universe to reach you and I’d still be willing to journey on in search of you.

You came into my world and you invited me into yours with the way you cherish and love me. You see good in me where others only see bad; you see the best in me while others could only see the worst. I’m grateful that you didn’t give up on me and leave me to my ruins. And I wish you have a great and awesome day ahead of you, my baby. Good morning to you, sweetheart.

Everything around me seems to remind me of what we share. The moon reminds me of your always bright smile. The stars your sparkling beauty.The flowers your sweet body fragrance and every nature of your unique personality. You remain everywhere around me. Good morning dear.

When I first met you, I thought you to be like every other lady until now I came to realize how important you are to me; a genius lover that puts smile all over my face I adore you—no matter how far we are to each other, I will always be the closest human to your heart, I love you!

Often times I wish I could find the right word to describe how much you mean to me; how much I cherish and love you; how much I respect and honor you. No words would be enough to describe the feeling within me the moment you came into my life. It must have been grace that brought you to me and I’m blessed to have someone as beautiful as you are. Good morning beautiful.

I think the sun is taking longer to rise in the morning. I can tell why it’s dawdling; it knows that it’s not the brightest source of light anymore. Every day it looks down on you and feels a pang of jealousy, knowing it could never light up my life the way you do.

I really can’t wait to walk down the aisle with you beside me, my princess, just as much as I can’t wait to wake up beside you each and every morning. You’ve made me become a better and caring person than ever before. I feel lucky to have someone as special as you are, and I’m honored to be with you. I cherish you forever sweetheart. Good morning and have a great day ahead of you.

The scent from the flowers in the garden each and every morning reminds me of your sweet fragrance. The sight of the glowing sunrise reminds me of your beautiful smiling face. The sound from the birds singing outside my window reminds me of your lovely voice. Everything in nature reminds me of you, my love and I’m glad that you’re mine. Good morning my baby.

Good morning love. I want you to know that you can always get ahold of me. Just call me and I’ll come running. I’ll do whatever I can to help you succeed. I know that you have everything you need within you, I know that you deserve all the success in the world. So, get up and face the day!

It is my pleasure to reach out to a wonderful queen like you who is always happy; there is one special thing I love about you and it is the fact that you never nag or complain unnecessarily. This is the kind of wife I have been searching for my dear angel. I love you!

Our love is beyond all description. The universe in all of its glory isn’t enough to allow for a true comparison. Eternity isn’t long enough for us to spend together. All of the diamonds in the universe wouldn’t sparkle with the light I see in your eyes. All the stars in existence don’t burn with the heat of our romance. I could say I’d run to the edge of the universe to reach you and I’d still be willing to journey on in search of you.

You’re magic. You’ve transformed every part of my life. You looked at me with your big, beautiful eyes and my heart grew to a larger size. You gave me a kiss and time seemed to freeze. You had to leave and when you did you took some of the sun’s brilliance. You said the magic words “I love you,” making my worst days bearable and my best days wondrous beyond all imagining.

Good morning beautiful, I hope you already awake because the world cannot wait to see your great spirit and wonderful hart again. I wish you a great day ahead! And in whatever you do, know that I love you and always thinking about you!

I like to look into your sparkling eyes… What they do to my heart, I’m yet to understand. That’s why I keep you right inside my heart where I get to see those eyes whenever I wish to. I saw it this morning and I’m moved to tell you again and again that I love you. Good morning angel.

Whatever this day holds I know I can handle it. I have something stronger than anything the world can throw at me, your love. So, this morning I want you to know that you have everything I can offer you in return, whatever happens today know that no one can take away the love I have for you.

Breakfast hasn’t been the same ever since I met you. It used to be I could find satisfaction in a stack of pancakes or a plate full of bacon and eggs. Now I find none of the old dishes satisfy me, the only thing I really want to taste in the morning is your sweet lips.

You came into my world and you invited me into yours with the way you cherish and love me. You see good in me where others only sees bad; you see the best in me while others could only see the worst. I’m grateful that you didn’t give up on me and leave me to my ruins. And I wish you have a great and awesome day ahead of you, my baby. Good morning to you, sweetheart.

This amazing man I am today is all courtesy of your astonishing love, the great person I have become I owe it no other person than you, you have completely turned my life around, I owe strong commitment to this wonderful union and I want to be with you the rest of my life, I love you so much.
Your love brightens up my day and lightens up my world because you always rock my world with the way you cherish and love me. I love you beyond the stars. Good Morning!
You are the pulse that throbs in my veins, you are the antidote that frees me of all pains. You are the rhythm of my heartbeat, without you my life would be incomplete. Good morning.
You have found true love when you realize that you want to wake up beside your love every morning even when you have your differences.

You are the woman of my dreams. I am very lucky to have you in my life and to be able to call you my woman. You have given me reasons to laugh, smile and be strong even when I feel like I can’t go on. You are an amazing woman and I am so glad I met you. You give me hope of a brighter tomorrow and assurance of a greater today. Being with you is a taste of heaven on earth. I am more than blessed to have such a delightful woman as you in my life. You are exciting, charming, intelligent and endearing. May your day be filled with things that give you joy. May your day leave a constant smile on your face. Have an exciting day. Good morning, baby.

Today, I want you to shine your way. Be the best version of you that you can ever be. You are awesome the way you are but each day presents new opportunities to be better than how you used to be. You are an awesome woman and you give me so much joy. You leave me breathless and stunned with how you handle issues. You always turn situations around. You are my personal magician who always looks for ways to make me the best man I can ever be. I want you to be the woman you’ve always wanted to be. I would support your dreams and aspirations because they make you who you are. I love you. Good morning, Princess.

I need you and I miss you when you are not around. I feel incomplete when you are not present with me. You dispel my doubts and make me believe in love more than I ever thought was possible or dreamed I could. I don’t know what I would do without my sweet guide. You are my flashlight when I am in the dark and the sweet candy that I can’t get enough of. You are necessary and a compulsory part of me. You are all I need. There is no one else in this world for me but you. I am forever connected to you. Make sure you have a wonderful day. I am counting down to when I can see your lovely face. Good morning, my sweetheart.

I want to spend the rest of my life with you. Having you in my life is a constant reminder of how much I am blessed. You have made a fulfilled man. You don’t have to go through life alone because I am here and I would never let you down. Being with you breaks down my walls and enables me to be young and free. You bring out the child in me and enable me to see the world in a brighter way. It gives me the energy I need and enhances my productivity. You bring out the very best in me. I am a much better man, thanks to you. Let your day bring you more blessings than ever before. Soar today and keep being beautiful. Good morning, my love.

I would stop time for you. Waking up with you would be bliss. I promise to constantly treat you better than any other man. You deserve the world. You are my queen and deserve to be treated like a queen. I want to always be present in your life, to be there to share your pains, sorrows, achievements and your joy with you. I want to be there to share your life with you and be your backbone and pillar of strength when you are weak. No one else holds my interest and my heart in the palm of their hands. I want to thank you for letting be a part of your world. I totally support you, your dreams, goals and aspirations. Keep being as amazing as you are. Good morning, darling.

You are like a treasure buried deep in the earth. In which every area dug from the earth reveals a new discovery that leaves everyone spellbound. Every day, I get to meet and spend with you reveals a much more amiable and charming lady than the day before. I have discovered something worth cherish with the whole of my life and that is you. I can do anything as long as I have you in my heart. Your love fills my heart and no one can ever take your place in my heart. My heart belongs to you. You are the captain of my heart. It always beats for only you. I am constantly captivated by my sweet and lovely sugar plum. I love you, baby more than you would ever know.

I was swimming in the ocean of the game when your hook of love pick me up and brought me to safety on the ship of your love. We are connected in diverse ways. In your eyes, I see my present and my future. My past seemed empty and bleak because it lacked the love of an awesome and dazzling woman like you. You are stronger than any other woman I know. I love that even in your imperfections, you always find a way to make them appear perfect. I have never felt connected with anyone as much as I do sit you, it’s like we are one in thought, dreams and goals. You make me a complete man. I am a mess without your love. I totally love you, my darling.

I am only one call away from you. I would be there whenever you need someone to stand with you, for you and beside you. No one causes palpitations of my heart but you. It’s like it beats to the sound of the music that only you create. There is no one for me but you. I am blinded with love for you. My love makes name see your flaws but much more than that it makes me see the beauty of your imperfections that are carefully woven to create a masterpiece of delight and love so strong it weakens me. I don’t know about you but I can never get enough of you. I love you with a love that had only been reserved for you from the beginning of time.

You keep me focus and leave a large smile on my face. Without your love, I have nothing. My life would be empty and hopeless. Our love is unique, so pure and true. I am forever bound to you. My heart is a captive of your love. You love weakens me to my marrows and yet strengthens me in a profound way. It makes the world much more enjoyable. The universe itself is in agreement with our amazing love. I am willing to explore the length, depth and breadth of our love. It is so deep and strong that nothing can destroy it. You have made me a happy man, so I promise to always look for ways to bring smiles to your face. I love you, my sweet choc.

Nothing in the universe can compare to the depth of our love for each other. I always shied away from love and preferred to just have fun. Now, I can’t imagine not loving you. You are my weakness because I can’t bear to have anything negative happen to you, yet you are my strength because you help bring all my potentials into the limelight. I don’t know what tomorrow holds but I know there is no tomorrow for me if you are not present in it. In your eyes, I see my future and in it is a home with you. You are more than I ever expected to have in my life. I love that you are full of life. My life is filled with excitement because of my one and only darling.

Top of the morning to the woman who owns my heart and rocks my world. May your day be filled with the wonders of living, the joy of fulfilling your dreams and the bliss of being so loved. Walk with pride and let your confidence and passion radiate to those you come in contact with. Give your best and leave them speechless and dazzled by your intelligence and coordination. Have a great morning, cupcake. I miss you dearly.

You are the only woman who had the nerve to break my loneliness to become the centre of my world. You have brought great delight to my heart and joy to my life. May your day bring you challenges that make you better and more efficient than yesterday. May it be fulfilling to you in ways that matter to your heart. Keep being happy, your happiness is paramount to me. I am counting down to when I would see your lovely face again. Good morning, my angel.

I am always left intrigued by you. You captivate me with your smile and your intelligence. You are as sweet as honey and more dazzling than the worlds most expensive jewellery. You are Gods perfect work of art. I love the fact that you are sweet, charming and you leave me more and more in love with you. Let your day be blessed and bring you favour in whatever you do and whoever you meet. You are always on my mind. Good morning, darling.

Good morning, beauty. Woke up this morning thinking of how rich my life seems to be because of your presence in it. You are always on my mind. You are my priority. I look forward to seeing a new day because each day is a new opportunity to renew our bond and for me to view my greatest treasure. You don’t know how much you mean to me. You make my world seem like paradise. Have an awesome and exciting day, my precious one.

Your presence in my life makes my mornings wonderful and my evenings mind-blowing. You have all you need to overcome and conquer the world on your inside. Face your fears head-on. Look for the best in every situation. You have you need to be the best. I believe in you and I am always rooting for you everytime and every day. Be the star I know you are. Leave people spellbound today with your words and actions. Have an awesome morning, my beautiful and amazing sugar pie. I love you, darling.

The sun comes out in the morning to bath you with kisses from me and give you a dose of love and confidence. Your day would be filled with different shades of success and happiness because my queen deserves the world. I am counting down to when I would be able to hold you in my arms again because that’s where you belong. Make sure you have an awesome time today. Work hard and play hard. Have a wonderful morning, baby.

Each morning I wake up with a smile on my face and love in my heart because you have made me the happiest man alive. You have brought sunshine to my life and a different form of freshness that can only be associated with your presence in my life. You have made me a very glad man. I wish you the very best of the day. May your day be filled with success in all you do and stress-free. Have an awesome day. Good morning, my beloved.

My sweet choc, my one and only beauty queen. The queen of my heart and the light of my world. I just wanted to remind you of how dazzling you are and how you always manage to steal my breath away. Seize every opportunity that presents itself to you today and be the total woman I know you are. Let everything your hand touch be successful. Keep being my sunshine on a rainy day. Good morning, mon Cherie.

I never want you to forget how much I love you and how passionate I am about all that concerns you. I want to use this message to remind you that you are always on my mind and in my prayers. So, wake up to this wonderful day and know you are always my number one. My love for you knows no bounds, limits or restrictions.

Commitment to you is very important to me. Your love has transformed my life and filled it with love and care, emotions that were far from me but now are forever a part of me the courtesy of an amazing woman such as you. Wake up to the giant dose of love and kisses that is coming your way in the form of the sun. I love you, baby.

I see you everywhere and in everything I do. You are always on my mind. You are all I am able to truly think about. You are my first and last thought each day. I identify a brand new day with fresh thoughts of how amazing my woman is. I love you and always look for ways to spend more time with you. You flood my heart with so much love.

You dispel the darkness and negativity in my life with your optimism and the ray of sunshine your presence and your words bring about. I feel free and I am able to truly live because I have a jewel that’s worth more than gold or any treasure available on planet earth. You are my sunshine and that why I look forward to every new day.

I am never alone because you are always with me despite the distance between us. The distance means nothing because you are always in my heart. I am always eager to see you. Seeing you flood my heart with unexplainable emotions that weaken and strength me. I love knowing I love you and that you love me back. Have an awesome morning, my angel.

I have never felt this way about anyone. I feel elated whenever I think of you. My day is not complete and does not begin unless I see or talk to you. My world has received a brand new light and life in the person of you. You make my world a better and wonderful one. You alone own my heart. I am deeply in love with you and would continue to remain in you.

When I am with you, there is no place in the world I would rather be than by your side. You inspire me and make me believe in the potency of love. As I long as I have you in my life, I don’t necessarily need the most comfortable things in life because with you my life is complete and beautiful. You are my beloved and my only love.

Wake up this morning because my world needs you for it to be able to greet the new day and enable me to function properly. My world is empty with you. You are the centre of my universe. The hope I have a brighter and more beautiful tomorrow is attached to you. I need you, your smile and laugh. Everything about you makes me a complete man.

You are the queen that sits on the throne of my heart, every second of every day. With you, the air, sky, trees, grasses, houses and everything that the eyes can see seem much brighter and beautiful. With you in it, my world is stable and wonderful. I am so glad I met you and you are mine. I adore you, my baby.

Anywhere and whenever you call me I would be there. You are never truly alone because the key to a heart is with you and I am only a call away. Wake up today and bask in the warmth of the sun, enjoy the refreshing that comes with the rain and above all know that my love follows you and sticks by you, no matter the condition of the weather. I adore you, my sweetheart.

I am love struck and there’s nothing I can do about it. My heart is bound and shackled to you with no hope of escape. You supercede all my fantasies. You are more beautiful than the purest diamonds. Your beauty comes from within where it illuminates and dispels all the negativities in my mind. You are my sun, every day.

I don’t need the sun to come out to identify the time of the day. You are the sun I need. I wake up every morning to the smile on your face and rest in the evening to the love in your eyes. Waking up beside you makes me the happiest and luckiest man alive. I have all more than I could ever dream of or desire in you, my sweet candy.

The sun peeps out of the clouds each day to remind you of yet another opportunity to dazzle and outshine everyone. Today, seize every opportunity that presents itself to you. Go all out and make your dreams reality. Accomplish a lot baby. I believe in you and your abilities. No one else can do it better than you, my sweetheart.

I am stunned and amazed at how lucky I am because I have such an enchantress in my life. You steal my breath away. The love I feel for you has no boundaries and it can be explained or contained. It overflows and spills to everyone connected to you. I have never felt this connected to anyone. You are my light in the darkness and my safe haven.

Your style is uniquely yours. I never knew we the extent one could to for love. Now that I have met you I know there is no mountain I won’t climb for you, no river I won’t sail for you and no limit I won’t cross just to see you smile. My home is wherever you are. Life makes sense when you are in it and without you, it’s totally empty.

Each day is a wonderful day and a chance to keep on loving. I have wonderful days which turn to glorious weeks, glorious weeks turn to marvellous months and marvellous months turn to amazing years because of you. You make me glad to have known you with decisions you make and the amazing results that come out from such decisions. You are a genius, my darling.

Everything about you leaves me spellbound. You are the love in my eyes, the hope in my heart, the air of freshness I enjoy and the ray of sunshine I bask in. You are truly an amazing woman for you to be able to accomplish all these feats. You spice up my day with your presence and your love that gives me hope and makes me cope.

I tried sleeping but sleep evaded me because I was lost in thoughts of you. I still am. You have turned my life around. You turn my night to day and the moonlight to daylight. You make me soar higher than I ever thought possible. You make me a real man with your presence in my life and I am left awestruck with how much you’ve changed me.

I have never felt this completely in sync with another person like I feel with you. You have brought light into my dark world. I don’t know how to truly appreciate you or express the depth of my feelings for you. You leave me breathless whenever I see you or think of you. I am glad to know you and call you my woman. I love you, my beauty.

I am awake, gazing at the stars. I am wondering what I did in my last life to be able to deserve you. You are my reason to strive to see a new day. You have brought peace and a sound mind to me. I no longer walk without a sense of direction because I have an angel to light my way. You have brought so much joy to my life.

I have never felt a bond this strong except with you. I don’t know what the future holds for us but I know there is no future for me without you by my side. I just had to tell you how much you mean to me. Have a great sleep and wake up with the sun on your face and love in your heart. I love you so much, my darling.

I wake up every day with a smile on my face and love in my heart for one special person and that’s you. I sleep every night with thoughts of you on my mind. I just wanted to tell you how much I love you and miss you. I am eagerly waiting for the morning to be able to see your lovely face and your delightful smile that completes my day.

I am lovesick and my medicine is you. I love you with the whole of my being. You are the joy of my life. Our relationship has only been for a few weeks but I feel like I have known you forever. My life has never remained the same since I have met you. I long for the day we would be together forever. I long to wake up with you by my side.

I woke up this morning and the first thought on my mind was my dazzling queen. I hope you slept well. Wake up today and have fun. I look forward to our meeting this evening. In fact, I am anxious to see you and spend time with you. Stay pretty and have an awesome day. You know how much you mean to me.

You fill my heart with uncountable joy and my love for you overwhelms me. my heart. I would keep loving till my last breath. I would give up my last breath to keep on loving you, my sweetheart. You are a woman who is not afraid to be true to herself regardless of the opinions of others and stand up for whatever she believes in. I love your tenacity.

Gazing at you in the morning strengthens me and inspires me to overcome the day. You are my propelling force. I see you in all I do and it makes me do everything perfectly because you deserve nothing short of the best in everything and every way. I owe my success to you. You have brought untold goodness to my world. Wake up, my sunshine.

I need you to wake up and illuminate my day because my day does not begin without you. I always want you beside me because you make me feel on top of the world and when I look at you I feel like the luckiest man alive. You are everything a sane man would want in a woman and I have all I need in any woman in you. Good morning, sunshine.

Gazing at you in the morning strengthens me and inspires me to overcome the day. You are my propelling force. I see you in all I do and it makes me do everything perfectly because you deserve nothing short of the best in everything and every way. I owe my success to you. You have brought untold goodness to my world. Wake up, my sunshine.

I need you to wake up and illuminate my day because my day does not begin without you. I always want you beside me because you make me feel on top of the world and when I look at you I feel like the luckiest man alive. You are everything a sane man would want in a woman and I have all I need in any woman in you.

You make every day more wonderful than the last and a whole lot better. Thanks for being a part of my life. I miss your laughter and your sweet and funny sense of humour. Thanks for being a part of my life. Just as my morning does not start without a cup of coffee, it does not start without you, for you are more potent than any cup of coffee.

Waking up beside you leaves me feeling prepared to overcome any challenge that presents itself today. I am not the strongest man on earth or the best looking man but for you, I would strive to be the best I all I do. I want the best for you and would support your dreams till they become your reality. You are the smile I wear on my face. I love you, my sweet.

I wake up feeling ecstatic because the gates of my heart are opened and overflowing with wonderful sensations because of your loving smile and wonderful presence in my arms. The whispers of the wind, the fluster of the leaves and the dewdrop on the ground is a signal to embrace a new day and it worth embracing with you.

Each new day is a fresh opportunity to express our love and much chances to hold you in my arms because that where you belong. It hard to let you go in the morning but I do so while eagerly awaiting the evening because then I can have you close to me. Make this day the best day of your life and know I am waiting for you. I love you, my sweet.

I want you to wake up today feeling loved with a big smile on your face. You give me the confidence and vigour I need to go through the day and not succumb to its pressures. You know how to channel my sadness and make me smile even in the toughest of situations and hardest of times. I wish the best for you only. I love you.

My greatest fantasies are put to shame because of you. You make me smile more than ever before and leave me floating in the clouds. No one could ever take your place in my heart and mind. I wish I could promise you the world but it’s not mine to give instead I promise enough all of me, that all I have to give. I promise to cherish you till the day I die.

My night was memorable because of you. I don’t feel like waking up this morning, I just want to keep being next to you. I am super excited and have extra springs in my steps. I feel like I am resting in the stars and conversing with the moon. My morning still feels awesome and I hope yours is too. I can’t wait to hold you in my arms again. I love very much, my sweet choc.

Embedded in this message is my heart with thousands of hugs and billions of kisses for you because you are worth more than the world to me. I am sorry I want there to hold you in my arms during the course of the night but I hope you have an awesome time enjoying your day but keep thinking of me.

I have become an addict who is totally and absolutely addicted to your brand of loving. I look forward to the future and forget the past because I see you in my future. I am waiting patiently for the day I can call you my wife. I now know my life would incomplete without you in it. I would love you till the sun and moon are no more. Wake up to a great day.

No matter the weather, as long as I am with you, all would well. Falling in love with you was never my intention but now, I can hardly imagine my life without you. You make me feel good and blessed to have you in my life. I long to wake up knowing you are mine and having you in my life. I love you with the whole of my heart.

Having you in my life makes the rough patches endurable. You make me see things in a new light and have brought out my best abilities to the front line. My life feels empty without you and my mornings senseless without you. You are worth more than this world to me and trust me, I love living in this world. Keep being you. I love everything about you, baby.

I have become insatiable. You are the best aphrodisiac in the whole world. My day begins when I hear from you or see you face. There is no one for me but you. You make my world come alive with your passion and your sense of humour. You make me have hope for the future. You make all my dreams come true, sweetheart.

The sun brings warmth when it shines but I don’t need the sun because I have you to give me warmth. You are a rare woman and I don’t know what I did to deserve you but I am one very lucky man to have you in my life. You have brought success and peace of mind into my life and I deeply appreciate everything you do for me.

This day holds new hope, new blessings and new risks. You are the most unique woman I have ever met. I get lost in thoughts of you and I find myself drifting. You hold me up and keep me floating even when the pressures of the day try to weigh me down. No one in my life makes it worth living as much as you do. I love you, totally.

My day does not start until I have had a good dose of strong black coffee but now I no longer need the coffee, all I need is you and your good loving. Nothing else brightens my morning as much as you do. Today, life is waiting for you, so open your eyes. I want you to breathe in the fresh air and open the doors to opportunities. I love you, my sweetie pie.

I pledge to forever ensure there is a smiling on my darling beauty’s face. I don’t need time to identify the morning, with its always daylight in my mind and heart. Seasons may come go and the years run by but I would never get tired of waking up next to you. I would hold your hands and guide you, as long as you need me to. Good morning, my love.

Every breath I breathe every second of any day reminds me of you because your fragrance is ingrained in my mind and permeates the air whenever I think of you. With you, I always experience the magic that comes from being in love. Your coming into my life had brought a lot of amazing changes and ensured my days are great. Have an exciting day, baby.

Thinking of you warms me from deep within and it spreads throughout my body till there is no cold left. I don’t feel the cold because I have you to keep me warm. No one makes me too long for the morning or sunshine as much as you do. I love everything about you, my darling. Good morning, my morning dew.

The depth of my emotions and the passion I feel for you overwhelms me till there is no original thought or idea left in my mind yet I have the perfect sense of direction because it leads me to you. I hope you slept well but wake up and have a great day and take as many risks as possible and strong. I love you, my sweet pie.

My best time of day is when I turn in bed, open my eyes and look up to see you smiling at me with your radiant smile. It dispels my drowsiness and gives the energy to face a new day. I love starting my day, it ensures my day is great. Good morning, my beautiful princess.

Keeping you safe is my number goal and I feel like a superhero when I have you safely tucked in my arms. I could spend all day cuddling with you. As hard as it is, spread your wings and fly and remember how much I love you and how my world is centred on you.

The hue of the sun is beautiful but not as much as your beauty. I enjoy the serene environment that comes with the breaking of dawn because I just rest and listen to the rhythm of your heartbeat and it’s the best music to my ears. I love my life as long as it’s with you. I live to make you happy because you have always made me a happy man.

You have redefined my life and made it much better and brighter. You have brought sunshine to the rain my life was. I love in the way, no other man as loved you. I know you are imperfect but for me, all I see when I look at you is how amazing you are and how lucky I am to have such an amazing woman in my arms every morning.

There is a constant smile on my face because you are always on my mind, my first and last thought every second of the day. You make all my aspirations and dreams seem like reality because you are there to propel me forward and cheer me on. Have a truly beautiful day, my one and only love.

With you, I am as tame as a lamb and as wild as a lion. Waking up to the beauty you are would leave any man breathless and I get the opportunity to view that every day. It makes me realise how lucky I am to call you my wife. I love you, baby more than you could ever think or imagine.

I know I don’t deserve to be loved by you but I am grateful you took a chance and decided to love me. Thanks for loving me with my flaws and making me a proud and ecstatic man, who has an amazing woman as his wife. Have a great day, my superwoman.

You glow like the sun and illuminate my life the way the sun does to the moon. You are my sun and your glow reflects on me. Be the best version of you today and take as many risks as is possible. I believe in you and your abilities. If anyone can do it, I believe that person is you. Good morning, my darling love.

I want the spend the rest of my life with you. You make me the best man could be and there I who other women for me but you in the entire universe. You are everything and more. My sunshine and my reason for waking up every morning. Have an awesome time today and remember how much I love you with the whole of my heart.

I long to wake you up every morning with millions of kisses. Your breath lingers on my skin and fills my mind with beautiful memories this enables me go through the whole day. I just want to remind you of how much thoughts of you consumes my mind and how I am a captive of your love. I love you, my darling baby.

I don’t need an angel because God has blessed my life with an amazing one. Wake up this morning and embrace the blessings, risks and challenges in the day. They would make you much better and move forward in the directions of your dreams. I love you, baby. Keep glowing every second of the day, every time of the year.

I no longer need fantasies to wake up to because I have you to wake you to. I don’t need to dream of the woman of my dreams because I have a much better reality. You are much better than any fantasies or dreams. You make a man feel whole and longing for you every time of the day. I love you, my sweetheart.

Anxiety and worries have no place in my mind because all my mind can conceive and think of, are you? My morning is only pleasant because you are in my life. May your morning bring you great memories and a wonderful day. Have an awesome time.

Morning has become my favourite time of day because I wake up to the most beautiful woman on the planet. You have brought so much joy to my life. I don’t know how you managed to do it but I am absolutely grateful. Wake up and embrace the day. I am cheering you on from where I am. I love you and trust in your abilities, my love.

You have opened up my heart and mind to the beauty available in the breaking of dawn. Its beauty reminds me of the beauty I have been blessed with and I am deeply grateful to have you in my life and in my arms every morning and evening. Have a splendid time at work today. I would be waiting for you with kisses at the doorstep.

You are irresistible and I find myself unable to resist your charm. I am hooked on you and there is no one for me but you. No one with the same rhythm as you. Our being together is the perfect symphony, so beautiful and so pure. I wish you a bright and amazing morning filled with happiness and love form my whole being.

I have learnt to believe in how fast the impossible can become possible since I fell in love with you. There would be no bright and great morning without you in my life and the smile on your face to brighten my life. I love you to the moon and back.

I can’t dream of holding another woman in my arms, it won’t feel right. You are the only legit woman who completes me and feels right in my arms. My morning has become amazing since you came into my life. I heart skips beat whenever you are around. I love you, baby. Good morning, my love.

No wealth in the world would fill my life with as much riches as your presence does. Everything I so much better with you in my life. I don’t know how you do it but I can’t imagine letting you go. Good morning to my partner and the love of my life.

Coffee can be replaced, same as the sheets on the bed but nothing can replace your scent that lingers in the air, your love that envelopes my heart or your smile that leaves me captivated. Nothing and no one can replace you in my life. Have an awesome morning, my angel.

I grow more in love with you the more mornings we spend together. I want to to be the one you love, trust and need every day. No morning is fully bright without you. I love you so much that sometimes I can breathe easily.

Waking up to a new day is marvellous because I know I get to spend more time with the woman of my dreams and only one person fits the description in the whole world and that is you – my angel. There is no woman for me but you.

You make me dream of being married and the stability that comes with it. I never imagine I would want to spend my entire life with one woman but now It’s something I long to do with you. Marriage to you would be bliss. I miss having you in my arms, darling.

Sleep evades me at night, it’s a wonder I am able to function at optimum level. You are the reason why I am sleep deprived and why I function at my best. I want to be the kind of man deserving of you and yet I can’t stop thinking about you. Good morning, angel. Have an awesome time at work today and give it your best.

If loving you the way I do is wrong, then I don’t want to be right. I just want to keep on loving you with as much passion as I possess now. Good morning to the most beautiful woman in the world, my sweetheart.

You have taught me to be fearless in love and what it means to love with total abandon. It was a hard bit for you, everything and anything is worth you. My future is bleak with you to be my sunlight and illuminate my steps in the right direction. I love you with all of me, my darling. Have an exceptional day, filled with the best wishes for you.

For us, there is only forever and no goodbyes. My morning requires no coffee but an adequate dose of your love. I sail on the widest ocean and dive the deepest seas when I have you in my arms. Good morning, my morning sunshine.

The morning just helps to reinforce how much I love you and I’m passionate about you. You are more appealing that breakfast from Starbucks. You are worth more to me than a million bucks. I love you from morning till night and forever.

I am left with no inhibitions because you are my world. I know we would be alright as long as we are together. I have nothing to hold me back, my only anchor is you. Good morning to my greatest treasure. I wish your day is filled with bliss cause you deserve much more.

Your love is my greatest treasure, one I cherish with the whole of my being. I desire you more than ethanol I have ever desire anything in the world. Morning reminds me of how much I long to always have you with me. Good morning, my sweetie pie.

My sweet chocolate, sweeter than honey, brighter than the sun and deeper than the deepest ocean. You are smart and strong, my very own superwoman. My mornings lack an essential ingredient once you are not in the picture. Here’s to a wonderful morning with you.

I can’t get you out of my mind. You are my sun and ray of hope on a gloomy day. You are the only one who can bring me out of the darkness with your sunshine that’s bright enough to remove my pain, shame and fear and fill me with life and hope. Good morning, my beautiful warrior.

You make my day brighter and clearer once I view it through your eyes. Your or essence give everything a certain radiance that can only be associated with your presence. You have opened my eyes to the beauty to be found in everything. Good morning, my star and dazzling princess. Have an exciting day.

Morning comes with new hopes, joys and more chance at things be it love, friendship and family. I appreciate the morning because I get to spend more time with my love and my world is much better for it. Top of the morning, darling.

Your smile brings light into my life and makes every negative or dark emotion disappear. I could spend forever staring at your angelic face and never get tired of doing so. You bring out the knight in me and make me want to protect you with my life because my life depends on you. Your love fuels me with the will to keep living and being the best.
Sharing a smile is the easiest way to get your day started off right. Here is a smile for you so that you can have a day as wonderful as you are. Good Morning!

The rising sun reminds me of your radiant face and the misty dew reminds me of your dreamy eyes. The sounds of the bustling city remind me of your soft whispers and the cool breeze reminds me of your tantalizing kisses. Good morning.

I thank God for giving me eyes to see the beauty of the sunrise, nose to smell the fragrance of the blooming flowers and a heart to love the most wonderful person in my life. That is you, my dear. Good Morning!
The sun is shining, the birds are chirping and the bustling sound of the nearby city is approaching. Wake up sleepyhead, I sent you a message saying; “I love you”. Hope you like it.

Life is never perfect. It is full of twists and turns which throw up challenges and problems. But it is all worth it because the first thing I see when I wake up is the romantic look in your beautiful eyes. Good morning.
You are the light of my world, The music in my heart and The first thought of my day. Good Morning My Dear.

I am tired of having to dream about you every night, I want you by my side so I can gaze at your beautiful sight. I am sick of waking up every morning and texting you, now I want to spend my mornings cuddling with you. I miss U, Good morning!

For the loveliest wife of mine, I wish you a good morning and send love for you to make your day beautiful. I wish you have a lovely morning and our love cheer you up and bring happier moments throughout your day.

I am tired of having to dream about you every night, I want you by my side so I can gaze at your beautiful sight. I am sick of waking up every morning and texting you, now I want to spend my mornings cuddling with you. I miss you, good morning.
Good morning, dear wife. Love you, sweetie. May this new day bring you prosperity, joy, luck and new hopes! May you have beautiful moments that will keep you going!
Good morning my sunshine! I thank God for bringing you into my life and making you my lifeline. All my friends are jealous of me for having such an understanding and beautiful wife.
Good morning brainy wife! Every morning I wake up with the satisfaction of having you as my wife. Marrying the most beautiful woman in the world is the best decision I have made.
Good morning sweetheart. I am filled with joy and pride every time I watch you sleeping peacefully next to me. You are the only superwoman I have ever met.
Good morning, my lucky charm! Your best wishes have always worked for me. You are the reason behind my success. Have a beautiful day, darling!
I would never want to stop looking at you, dear wife. But I am not that rich that I can quit earning and just keep looking at my beautiful wife. Good morning, sweetheart!
Good morning, rose! It doesn’t matter where I am, what I am wearing or what I am eating as long as you are with me as my loving wife.
Yes, life is an adventure and marriage is a maze. I am enjoying this journey because I have an amazing partner with me travelling. Good morning, honey!
Not all my decisions were right but I am proud of my decision to marry you. You are an amazing wife who has been with me through thick and thin. A very good morning to the love of my life!
I am the calmest when I am with you. All my worries, stress and fear just vanish when you are by my side. I love you forever and always sweetheart. Good morning.
A very good morning, dear wife! I pray that you are always blessed with good health and happiness. May all of your worries be taken away.
Our wedding is the most beautiful event in my life. Every day with you is a beautiful memory that I want to cherish all my life. Good morning angel!
My dreams and reality are all the same. I am living my dream because you are with me as my wife. I love you darling. Have a beautiful day, good morning!
You are the best gift that life has given to me. I will treasure this gift forever. I am the luckiest husband to have such a great human as my wife. Good morning!

Dear sweetheart, I love you a lot! The cup of tea you prepare for me, the food you make with love, the beauty you reflect are unmatched and stole my heart every morning. To my adorable wife, have a happy Good Morning.
You are my sunshine. My sun rises right infront of me every morning with a cup of tea. This cup of tea owes me a lot. Good Morning, my sweetheart!
Every morning, we both run for the work, but you always come first. We both chase new target and you become the best. Whilst my actions limit to myself your is selfless. Good Morning!
You know exactly what makes me happiest in the morning. And you do exactly the same every morning. Good Morning, my love!
To become someone’s love is not easy. It takes a lot. If I say, you are my life and I love you a lot, its all because of your efforts. Thanks for being my love sweetheart. Good Morning!
Dear love, I love you for the morning tea, for serving me my favorite food, for taking care of my family and for looking so perfect and beautiful every morning. Good Morning!
As long as you are with me, I know nothing could stop me to make your dreams come true. Good Morning, babe, I love you!
Your magical love has filled happiness in my life. All the moments I have shared with you has become memories, be it day or night. Good Morning, Love!
Every morning when I see your pretty face infront of me, I get the proud feeling that I had made the right decision of marrying you. Love you my sweetheart, good morning!
Your smile is more rejuvenating than the morning sunshine. So, keep smiling and making my day bright and beautiful. Good Morning Love!
Good Morning, my wonderful wife. I want you to smile and look beautiful like fresh bud all through your life. You made my heart garden-garden.
All my mornings are beautiful because you are there with me. I can’t imagine living without you ever. Good Morning Love!
Good Morning, Love. Today I just wanna thank you. Thank you for making my today, tomorrow and each day of my life beautiful.
Your unconditional partnership with my life has made our life incredible. Dear wife, I want you to be my wife whenever I take birth. Love you, Good Morning.
Sending good morning messages to you has become a kind of ritual for me. Today, I don’t have much to say. Accept my Good Morning wish with love.
The soft embrace, cuddles and fuzziness of your hair wrapping around my arms is the best feeling of my day and I get to wish you a very good morning by giving you a kiss. I love you, wife!
The way you make love to me is the best thing that happens to me in my entire day. I am blessed and overwhelmed to have a partner like you in my life, good morning, wife!
Life is not perfect but you have made my life just right and filled it with lots of love and joy. Good morning, honey!
You are music to my soul, energy for my life, food for my brain and the one always in my thoughts. Good morning!
I wish we never had to work for a living and could spend all day with each other and just love to survive. Good morning!
Your love is enough for me to live this life. You have been my angel who always rescued me. Good morning!
My mornings are most beautiful as I get to see the most gorgeous women peacefully sleeping in our bed. Good morning dear wife!
My stress level comes down to zero when I hear your voice or feel your touch. Your love is all that I crave for. Good Morning!
Good morning! It is a wonderful day and your husband has made you coffee and is waiting in the garden to have it with you.
To the supporting and loving wife, a warm good morning! I am the luckiest man to have found an understanding and caring wife.
No matter where I am, my lips curl on hearing your name or even your voice. From a proud husband, a very good morning!
Dear wife, Good Morning! Every morning when I open my eyes and see your face, I wish to God to gift me you in all my coming lifes, if it is there. Love you so much.
You are as refreshing as a cup of coffee in the morning. Are you made of caffeine or it’s the magic of your love darling. Good Morning!
You and I are like two sides of a coin. Incomplete and worthless without each other. Good Morning, my better half.
It’s all because of wives like you that men still yearn for marriage. Thanks for making my life so blissful. Good Morning, sweetheart.
My loveliest part of the day is when I hand over a cup of coffee to you, and you accept it saying thanks with a cute smile. It’s a new day sweetheart, good morning to you from the depth of my heart.
Together we have spent so many days. But still, when I open my eyes in the morning, it seems like the first day. You are so fresh and beautiful, you have made my life blissful!
To see your cute smile and face every day, I am ready to get late to the office. But I would prefer if you could wake up a little early, babe. Good Morning!
Good Morning sweetheart, your smile is the best part of my day. Could you manage to wake up little early, so that I can see your face for more time?
I am not afraid of challenges that day brings, because I start my day with your love and blessings. Love you, good morning my love.
The queen of my heart who has never failed to amaze, stood by my side and supported me to do the right thing. Have a wonderful morning my sweetheart!
It is a different feeling when I wake up next to you, I feel at home and more than that my love keeps increasing for you every single day. Good morning!

For the whole world the sun rises in the east and it is good morning when the sun rises. For me it is a good morning when I see my wife’s smiling face and my sun wakes up next to me. Good morning, my sunshine.
My greatest achievement is making you fall in love with me and marrying you. I am eagerly waiting to start our family with you. Good morning darling.
My lucky charm, nothing makes me happier than your smile and loving hug. I love you. Being your husband is a blessing. Good morning, my love.
Good morning, sweetie. You have introduced me to a beautiful world or love and romance else I never believed in love. You made me experience true love.
I pray that each sunrise brings with it a new hope and good vibes to you. You are always in my prayers and thoughts. Without you there is no me. Good morning.
Good morning, sweetheart. Thank you for being the love of my life. You are a happy woman and spread your happiness to everyone around. You have made my life cheerful and worth living.
I am sure I shall lead a happy and fulfilling life until you are my life partner. I am not sure if I can be happy without you, my love. Wishing you a very good morning! Have a nice day.

Life brings lots to the table, the good, the bad and the ugly. We have to go through everything even when we do not want to. I am sure our journey into life will be very smooth because we have each other. Good morning, honey.
Good morning, the lady love of my life. My day starts peacefully and with a happy note when I see you calmly sleeping beside me. I don’t like to wake up to my sleeping beauty.
Good morning to the superwoman of my family who knows how to manage work, business, family, friends, colleagues and time for herself. You are challenging women who have done very well for herself.
Good morning to my dreamgirl who has now become my wife. Love you sweetheart, have a nice time.
You were my dream, and now a reality. Thanks for making my life, so wonderful with your love and care. Good Morning.
Good Morning! This message is to show my wife that I love her a lot and will keep loving her all through my life.
Love, ecstasy, passion when combined together, it becomes you. Good morning wife, I love you!
I strongly believe that people who make fun of their wives do not have one like you. I proud of you my sweetheart and love you a lot. Good Morning.
The official start of my day is when I wish you good morning. And ends when I tell you good night.
The mornings that I wake up in your arms are wonderful and that I open my eyes next to you are the prettiest one. Good Morning, love!
Good morning my angel, last night you came in my dreams to tell me you love me a lot. Dear, you can’t even imagine how much I love you.

If I’m a tea you compliment me like biscuits. If I’m a great curry, you complete me like fresh bread. If I’m your lover, you compliment me by being a wonderful partner. Love you sweetheart, good morning!
Dearest wife, wishing you a very good morning. I wish you all the motivation in the world to accomplish the goals and plans that you made for yourself.
Hope you grow limitless and achieve everything you desire. Good morning, wife. May you find success everywhere you go and for every job you do, love you!
Good morning dear wife! We have had our ups and downs and long fights without talking to each other for a few days. But there was not a single moment in life that I did not love you.

Wishing you a great morning on this beautiful day, just like you sweetheart. All my life is spent falling in love with you, thinking about you, longing for you, dreaming about you and wishing for you.
To my darling wife, a very good morning! My life revolves around you, making you happy and seeing you smile. I work hard so that you can lead a happy life.
Good morning, my lovely wife! My day starts with your thoughts. I am so glad I fell in love with you. I am being a good husband only because of the love we two share.
Happy morning, it is a beautiful day just like you. You are the most beautiful woman I have seen and the smart woman who takes care of everything and everyone in her life.
To my lady love, a very good morning! I am all yours and I am happy and proud to be your husband. Thank you for all the love you have showered on me. I love you unconditionally.
To my beautiful queen, a very happy morning! You have shown me that true love does exist beyond fairytales too. You make my day beautiful and magical. I am so much in love with you.
To my inspiration, a warm good morning! You inspire me to love this life and be grateful. You give me a million reasons to smile and that is the reason I fell in love with you.
You are the first person I have loved more than myself. You still make my heart beat faster every time I steal a glance at you. Good morning, honey!
You mean the world to me. I can go to any extent to keep you safe. To my most favorite person, a very sweet morning! Dear wife, have a beautiful day and always keep smiling.
Love you sweetheart, you are the best person I know, the best girl I love, the finest daughter-in-law who my mother loves. Thanks for being so love-filled and supportive. Good Morning.
Good Morning, my sweetheart, you are the reason of my happy married life, and I am the reason of your happy married life.
When you are with me, I am not concerned about what difficulties life will throw at me. Good morning!
When a man has a strong and beautiful hand at his back. Nothing can stop him to get the success. Good morning.
Love you dear, you are the best thing that has happened in my life. It being 10 years of our marriage but you have not given me any reason to fight. Good Morning.
Good Morning, my love. You are the wife anyone dream of. Thanks for making my life so beautiful.
Marrying you is the best thing I have done in my life. And supporting me in all shades of my life is the biggest favour you have done on me. Thank you, dear! Good Morning.
To my sweetheart, my marshmallow, a very good morning! My mornings are blissful because I wake up beside you either seeing you smile or sleeping peacefully. I love you.
Good morning, my pretty wife! My mornings are blessed because I get to sip my coffee with you in our beautiful garden even though we both need to rush to our work.
Good morning, sweetheart! I pray that your day is relaxed and fun filled. May your day at work be happy and satisfying! I am blessed to be a husband to a pretty, loving, jovial and smart woman.
I am one lucky man in this world who gets to drink his morning coffee with the most beautiful woman in the world. I can never stop loving you. Good morning, sweetheart!
I am blessed to wake up with you every day. I am a lucky husband to have such beauty with brains as my wife. Good morning, sweetheart!
The most difficult part of my day is mornings. Poor me, I have to choose work over sleeping beside you and wake up early. To my forever and always, a very good morning!
Since the day we are staying together I have stopped having nightmares. Your love has made me a calm and happy person. To my special one, a very good morning, have a nice day!

My life saw light only when you entered it. You are my real source of energy, my sun. Without you I would not have experienced love and bonding. May your day be shining bright, good morning!
Your good morning kiss brightens up my day and is fuel for me to get through the day. I pray that you are always smiling and full of life like always. Good morning, sweetheart!

To make our life beautiful, you have made lots of compromises. Today, I wanna wish you Good Morning, with this word. I will make sure, for your decision, you will never have to regret. Good Morning!

You are not just the queen of my heart, but also its ruler. I only want to say, please handle it with care. Good Morning, love!
You are beautiful beyond anyone’s imagination because your beauty lies in your heart not on your face. Love you my queen. Good Morning!
To give a bright start to your day, sending a sweet ‘Hi’ filled with enormous love. Hope you will like it. Good Morning, sweety.
